snippet.title: The Shore VR | Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the World's first Lovecraftian VR Cosmic Universe. 

The Shore VR is a game that focuses on the mystery of the unknown on a forbidden island with horror elements. The whole story is based on mythology that goes deep through Lovecraft’s creations and beyond. The players will see the story from the eyes of a stranger and will experience the world through immersive atmospheric gameplay while trying to encounter the most nightmarish Lovecraftian entities. 

Release Date: TBA January 2022. 

Find out more about THE SHORE: 
🎮 Steam VR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1834620/The_Shore_VR/
🎮 HTC Vive: https://www.viveport.com/d00cf7c9-a4d3-4235-9f17-df8c82523543
🌐 Website: https://www.theshoregame.com 
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/theshoregame
🌐 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheShoreGame 
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theshoregame 
👾 Discord Server: https://discord.gg/gCCWYFWrKx 
💼 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-shore
🤖 SubReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/theshoregame 
📧 Contact: info@theshoregame.com 
🎵 Soundtrack: Apollon de Moura

#TheShore #TheShoreVR #SteamVR #HTCVive
